========
venvjail
========


.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/venvjail.svg

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/wrr/venvjail.svg

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/venvjail/badge/?version=latest

Python virtual environment which jails executed programs.


* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://venvjail.readthedocs.io.
